description:
Netflix has unleased yet another live action monstrosity upon the world and this time it's Avatar the Last Airbender's time to face the music. Every few minutes is a goldmine of cringe so let's start with one of their so called "improvements" to the series. Let's take a look at Sozin's big scheme that the original series wisely chose to leave out and now we see why.

If you liked this check out my main channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz1fTbwui7o5aDZ6W1dOLTQ

#avatarnetflix #avatarthelastairbender #avatar #netflixseries
title: Why Netflix Avatar is Garbage Part 1: Sozin's Big Brained Plan
